welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Des Peres, a charming city known for its picturesque parks and charming boutiques. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lambert-St. Louis International Airport houses the majority of the airport's services and facilities.

terminals.name: East Terminal
terminals.description: The East Terminal at Lambert-St. Louis International Airport is primarily used for international flights and houses customs and immigration services.

terminals.name: West Terminal
terminals.description: The West Terminal at Lambert-St. Louis International Airport serves as a hub for several domestic airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. No password required.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Spirit Of St Louis Airport houses all check-in counters, security checkpoints, and baggage claim areas.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Spirit Of St Louis Airport caters to private and charter flights, with amenities such as a lounge and concierge services.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at St. Louis Downtown Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at St. Louis Downtown Airport handles freight and package shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Alton Airport serves domestic flights and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Alton Airport handles all cargo and freight operations for the airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
